version_description: Please don't download this version due to a bug. Just wait for version 18.0. It should come in a day.

Exciting New Stuff for Subscribers:
- 10 New Phonics songs including -en song, -ug song, -im song and more!
- 5 Fun Stories about Animals.

Urgent bug fixed.

Exciting Update for Subscribers: Get the all new Dance Studio with 3 Songs so that kids can dance with a selfie camera.

Plus: A Brand New Thanksgiving song, 4 Fun New Phonics Stories and two new versions of Twinkle Twinkle and Head Shoulders Knees & Toes.

Exciting Update for Subscribers: Enjoy new versions of Five Little Monkeys, Humpty Dumpty & Itsy Bitsy Spider in 'Baby's First Rhymes'. Sing along to 2 Brand New Nursery Rhymes 'This Old Man' & 'This Is The House That Jack Built'

There's more:
- 5 New Phonics Stories
- Songs about Finger Family, Needs of a Plant, Greeting in different countries & Underwater animals!
- 'Zed' Versions of ABC songs in uppercase and lowercase!

Happy Thanksgiving to everyone!
There was a bug fix so we had to update the app again.

- A new twist to 3 rhymes with the selfie camera feature

Get the latest update of KidloLand, the only app you need for kids (1-5 years) with 1000+ songs, rhymes, games, stories and more!

In this update, subscribers get access to:
* 6 Chomping Monster Songs about Transportation, Exercise, Sharing, Long & Short Vowels & Musical Instruments
* 'Old MacDonald Had A Farm' gets a new twist with Surprise Eggs
* Enjoy the fun Selfie Camera Song 'Wheels on the Bus'
* Old MacDonald Discovers Fruits, Vegetables & Bugs in 3 New Versions of the original song

If you and your little one enjoy KidloLand, do show your love by rating and reviewing the app.

The wait is finally over...MAJOR UPDATE IS HERE!

Introducing two new subjects: MATH & CODING with over 90 NEW GAMES.
MATH: Learn number sense, counting, shapes, sorting, comparison, and patterns.
CODING: Learn the concept of sequences with 100+ levels.

We have also made age-group selection easier for you. You will be able to find content customized only for your child's age.

Coding: Learn the concept of sequences with 15+ new games.

Here's an AWESOME new update for you. KidloLand is now suitable for kids up to 7 years!

- We have added 85+ New Games for kids in the age group of 6-7 years, in the following topics:
Math
Geography
Science
English

- Introducing 15+ All New Two Player Games: Kids can challenge and play with their friends, siblings or family!

***Surprise Update!***
KidloLand gets a fresh new look for games and songs for kids under 2 years! Get on the train and join the fun ride. Update now!

Surprise Surprise! We've added NEW coloring games for kids (under 2 years). Have endless fun with coloring in new themes such as:
Animals
Birds
Fruits
Underwater
Vehicles
Toys
Eggs

We've also added all-new themes for some of your favorite sections in kids (under 2 years) such as Popping Time, Coloring Games, First Words & Music.

What are you waiting for? Download the latest update now!

NEW GAMES FOR YOU:
Have endless fun with brand new 'Baby Phone' games. Learn ABC, 123, Animal Sounds & Coloring!

Find exciting new themes in the kids (under 2 years) section: Colors, Shapes, Numbers, Animal Kingdom, Fruits, Vegetables, Nursery Rhymes & Surprises.

We hope you enjoy this amazing update. If you like the KidloLand app, don't forget to rate us 5-stars in the App Store!

AWESOME UPDATE FOR YOU!

KidloLand 2-4 years section gets a fresh new theme! Ride along the train and explore all the songs, games, and stories. What's more? Discover new themes of your favorite sections including Fruits & Vegetables, Shapes, Coloring, Early Learning, Animals & Puzzles. Also, watch out for a fantastic new feature of light and dark mode!

We hope you enjoy this awesome update. If you have any feedback, write to us at support@kidloland.com. We would love to hear from you! Also, don't forget to show your love by rating us 5-stars in the App Store!

We are happy to present an exciting new look of the numbers section. Learn numbers with songs, games, tracing, and much more!
Also, brand new musical instruments are added for kids under 2 years. Update now for the best experience!

Any questions or suggestions? Reach us at support@kidloland.com!

SURPRISE UPDATE

Looking to teach kids brushing and bathing? A brand new topic "Life Skills" is here! Play Bathing Time and Brushing Time activities and watch them master these skills easily. Stay tuned for more such activities coming soon.

Funtastic new topic "Learn to Draw" for kids (2-4 years). Draw and color vegetables, vehicles, birds, animals, and more!

Discover a whole new world of words in the all-new "Spell & Read" section for kids (6-8 years). Learn adjectives, prepositions, action words, and many more.

Get the latest update and enjoy these surprises! If you have any suggestions or feedback, reach us at support@kidloland.com. We would love to hear from you!
